title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: The validation for duplicated parameter names should be performed on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up too large for methods with many parameters.
